title: The Destroyed City
description: A sculpture by Ossip Zadkine symbolizing the destruction of Rotterdam in 1940.

title: Santa Claus
description: A controversial sculpture by Paul McCarthy, also known as 'Buttplug Gnome'.

title: Cascade
description: An art installation by Atelier Van Lieshout made from old oil drums.

title: Seated Woman
description: A bronze sculpture by Willem de Kooning, representing a seated female figure.

title: The Luchtsingel
description: A crowdfunded bridge designed by ZUS [Zones Urbaines Sensibles], linking three districts.
